headline: ALLE Q4 Deep Dive: Weak Americas Residential and Modest Guidance Drive Cautious Outlook
summary: Security hardware provider Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 9.3% year on year to $1.03 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.94 per share was 2% below analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Allegion’s Schlage Aspect Collection Links Design Push With Valuation Debate
summary: Schlage, an Allegion brand, launched the Aspect Collection, a new designer line of interior door hardware. The collection focuses on bold, geometric designs and modern finishes for residential and commercial interiors. The launch highlights Allegion (NYSE:ALLE) using design and technology as product differentiators within its portfolio. For you as an investor, the Aspect Collection sits at the intersection of Allegion’s core security roots and higher end interior design. Allegion, through...
